syllabus_info.syllabus_name: Cambridge International AS & A Level Business 9609

subtopic.sub_topic_name: Costs: Approaches to costing: full, contribution

learning_objectives.description: the differences between full and contribution costing
the uses and limitations of the full costing method
the nature of the technique of contribution costing
the difference between contribution and profit
situations in which contribution costing would be and would not be used
